name: Elven Assassin
description: Take a bow and kill hordes of orcs in the epic town defense game. You can play alone to conquer the leaderboards or unite with other assassins in online co-op mode. PS. Be careful to avoid massive axes thrown at you by orc warriors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Video Output: HDMI 1.4 or DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or greater port
